This application will help you to design your basic drawings with so much perfection. 

Please read the below instructions before you click Start button: 
 1. After you click the Start button, You will be navigated to paint screen. On the left side of that screen, you will see a color dial. You can change the color of drawing with the help of it. 
2. After selection, Draw any rough shape you wish, by moving your finger on the screen. 
3. Once you draw one shape, you need to click on the exact shape which you want to see either outlined or filled from the palette. 
4. If you want to delete any shape from your drawing, you can click the delete button from bottom right corner and then tap on the shape which you want to delete. 
5. Once you are done with delete, you will see a save button in place of delete and that will save the changes. After that you can resume the drawing 

 Hope you enjoy it! 
 Happy Painting.
